recipesJson.name: Emerald Lagassi
recipesJson.author: souporman
recipesJson.description: Pistachio Macaron Remix of Rhodonite. I removed the raspberry and fuji and adding in some TPA Pistachio. Why? Because pistachio is lyfe.

reviews.text: Great salvage of Rhodonite.  I can't stand INW Raspberry as a forward flavor, but the base recipe is solid.  Thank you for this, and yes, Pistachio is bomb.
